name: Fleet Med
overview: A one or two player text based strategy wargame. Tactical Naval Combat in the Med, 1939-1943. The Italian Fleet was battle ready and eager for a fight, as was the navy of England, the long term ruler o the Med. But only one fleet would survive the coming conflict. This is the fourth and final game in our WWII tactical naval series. The full available fleets of England and Italy are provided, as well as those of the United States and France. 9 scenarios and a "Build your own" system are included.
